name: The Shepherd (itch) (The Shepherd)
description:
If you love strategy, stories and sheep, then you will enjoy our game. Use your army of sheep to battle through 9 different levels all while looking for the clues to unravel the main story of the game.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbMr8_dH_W3FO-MhDKTBaWg
